resources.string: %s cannot be empty.
%s has invalid character (\'%s\' is invalid).
%s is valid.
%s is too short
%s is too long
%s must contain at least one alphabetic character.
%s must contain at least one lowercase letter.
%s must contain at least one uppercase letter.
%s must contain at least one digit.
%s must contain at least one special character.
%s must contains at least one dash
%s must contains at least one underscore.
%s must contains at least one dot.
%s must start with an alphabetic character, (not %s)
%s must start with a lowercase letter, (not %s)
%s must start with an uppercase letter, (not %s)
%s must start with a digit (not %s)
%s must start with a special character like (!@#$%^&*), (not %s)
%s must start with a dash, (not %s)
%s must start with an underscore, (not %s)
%s must start with a dot, (not %s)
%s must end with an alphabetic character, (not %s)
%s must end with a lowercase letter, (not %s)
%s must end with an uppercase letter, (not %s)
%s must end with a digit, (not %s)
%s must end with a special character like (!@#$%^&*), (not %s)
%s must end with a dash, (not %s)
%s must end with an underscore, (not %s)
%s must end with a dot, (not %s)
%s contains an invalid character, (character \'%s\' is invalid)
%s contains an invalid lowercase letter, (letter %s is invalid)
%s contains an invalid uppercase letter, (letter %s is invalid)
%s contains an invalid digit, (digit %s is invalid)
%s contains an invalid special character, (character \'%s\' is invalid)
%s contains an invalid dash, (dash %s is invalid)
%s contains an invalid underscore, (underscore %s is invalid)
%s contains an invalid dot, (dot %s is invalid)
